payload.description: Create useUploadQueue.js hook for upload queue state management with offline support. Returns { queue, addToQueue, retryUpload, cancelUpload, clearCompleted, isOnline, pendingCount, failedCount }. Uses navigator.onLine for connectivity, persists to localStorage, exponential backoff for retries (max 3 attempts).
payload.context: UploadItem interface: { id, blockId, file, filename, status: 'queued'|'uploading'|'complete'|'failed', progress: 0-100, error, retryCount, createdAt }. Listen to online/offline events. Persist queue to localStorage with key 'evidence_upload_queue_{taskId}'. Auto-retry failed uploads when back online.
